calcInterestPayment

public static final double calcInterestPayment(double principle,
                                               double interestRate,
                                               int numPayments)
Calculate an interest payment. This is the part we might reuse, so I break it out into its own method

Parameters:
principle - The amount of the payment
interestRate - The interest rate as as a double, ie 0.12
numPayments - The number of payments per year * the number of years.
Returns:
The interest

logToTheBase

public static double logToTheBase(double log,

Perform a log operation. The logarithm of of 8 to the base 2 would be: 3 = logbase(8, 2); or: 3 = log 8 2
